alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 02 at 9:24PM PST until January 03 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 25 to 31 expected, locally colder. * WHERE...Coachella Valley and San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Not quite as cold on Monday night, but frost is still likely in wind-sheltered areas.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts
